Instructions: There are 4 verbal instructions given to subject by an automated computer program connected to a speakerphone: The instructions were to wait until the experiment starts, relax, get ready as the trial is about to start, and mentally concentrate on the target.
TaskDescription: All the experiment is performed eyes closed. Relax periods last for about 9 seconds, are then followed by a period of 6 seconds where the participants is asked to "get ready" for the trial, followed by a period of 15 seconds of concentration. This sequence is repeated 20 times for each participant.
